page.title: 03Transport BELMONT,SURREY
page.content: Belmont village gets quite congested as people shop or use it as a cut through from the by-pass to the Brighton Road. The Sutton by-pass is very busy and dangerous. The by-pass can be very inconvenient for people who live near it because it is so noisy at night. Our school,The Avenue, is affected by the noise and pollution. It would be nice if we had a subway or bridge over it because it is a devil to cross. Safety is a main concern. Luckily a policeman helps us cross over before and after school, when the road is especially busy. Few children's dads actually work in the village, although some work nearby in Croydon, Sutton and Banstead. Many local people commute to London each day by train or car.
